scene_description_enriched: Two women are depicted in a field, engaged in harvesting. The woman on the right, standing upright, holds a sheaf of wheat in her left hand and appears to be gathering more with her right. She wears a long dress and a headdress. The woman on the left is bent over, actively cutting or gathering crops from the ground. The scene is set outdoors amidst tall stalks of grain, suggesting a harvest season. The surrounding decorative border is typical of illuminated manuscripts.
